about_the_game: Step into the medieval fantasy world of Shadows over Harken, where a dark necromancer threatens to corrupt the peaceful village of Harken and its surrounding lands. Join a unique team of heroes—Relic, a strong warrior; Alessia, a gifted cleric blessed with power; Hiligon, a powerful paladin; Klean, an agile fighter from another plane; and Neville, a unique and special bard. Experience an immersive visual novel that combines deep storytelling with combat mechanics, where your choices shape the story and the fate of the land. Engage in battles, explore a richly detailed world, and uncover hidden secrets while enjoying captivating artwork and an epic soundtrack. Can you lead your team to victory and stop the necromancer before it’s too late? History based in an original roleplaying campaing.
